column1: Do you (or would you like to) work in a Computing-based sector?
How would you describe your skill level?
How often does your degree/workplace require writing essays/reports?
Why would you like to study a course?
How interested are you in automating data?
How interested are you in managing (the flow of) data?

How interested are you in Cyber Security?
How interested are you in creating media?
How interested are you in learning Computing skills for Businesses/Enterprises?
How interested are you in learning methodologies such as Agile/Devops?
Is programming as a freelancer (mainly open-source projects) a topic of interest?

How much time would you like to dedicate to the course?
